Thanks for posting this, Carter!

There's a lot we can do for cross-card synchronization, we definitely hear you on that. We've been exploring lots of ways to do this "safely" and we hope as much as you that we can support this!

If anyone wants to nerd out on the details, I'm always happy to oblige :joy:. Just say the word.

Otherwise, I can tell you we are _definitely_ digging into this stuff and want it pretty badly too.
:hand::skin-tone-2: I'm very much down to nerd out in the details

I love this thread :joy:

<@U03BA1PRV7S> :applause: :clap:  for such a great post that not only asks for something, but including the _why_ behind it... With an example too! That's so helpful and really helps the team prioritize things better. This will always be more effective than just asking for tooltips.

And <@U02F2QPB4P8> a developer after my own heart, always digging for clues! For real, I respect that. It's a way of life :joy:
I'll add an upvote on this now too!
